titles.title: Expressing support for designation of March as "National Whole Child Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 2/22/2010--Introduced. Supports National Whole Child Month. Recognizes that ensuring that all children are healthy, safe, engaged, supported, and challenged is a national priority. Encourages parents, educators, and community members to support and provide a whole child approach to education for each student.
